column5: Great going !!  Thing about cottages its always work work work
T.J. it looks great coming all together! But are you sure it's going to hold all the OFNer's that will show up for the warming party?  Steeple  Stan
Looking good TJ!!!   Great handy work Good shot of that bush chicken Leechman
Love the cooler,  Wait, Forecast calls for warm weather and rain??  DRINK, FAAAAAST!!!!!!!!!!   Awesome job T.J.  What's the rent like??

Haven't had much useful to report up here whilst we wait for the snow to finally depart, but Thursday, me and a buddy (Tookie) hightailed it up to camp to see what the winter had done to it and get started on a new screened in porch for the front of the main camp.  There was still some snow on most of the road in.. Almost got stuck a couple of times.     A few new washouts on the way in, but these will flatten oust and make it more passable anyway    Got to camp to find the water higher than ever.  it was at least 7 feet higher than normal summer levels.  Im thankful the dock didn't flat away... the boats chained down, thanks goodness, lesson learned - haul that boat WAY up next year!      Went out to Kirkland Lake  to get the lumber needed and bumped into this fatty!! See you in the fall!  Lots of bush chickens around, hopefully we'll have a good crop this summer.    Got the lumber and got loaded (LOL).. 4 loads at 1 hour round trip apiece.    Cleaned off the debris on the porch and started framing.. I'm not much of a carpenter, but it wound up being really solid.    Natures cooler!        Then the weather got crappy... and stayed that way.            Any way were 75% done... going in next to finish the roof, paint it and install the door and panels...  but I should have it done before the bugs.. then I can go fishing!!  Ill have to edit out the steeple though...

Very nice....I always look forward to your reports from Jiggy Jiggy.  Quite the compound you have going there TJ.  Lots of hard work   Hope you and the family get lots of time to enjoy the fruits of your labour.  Cheers  Craig
looking good!
steeple = hillarious!!
Looking good TJ.. but it's starting to look like a "structure".
Nope... its screwed together for quick dissassembly.
You keep telling yourself that... I'm in a cluster .... at my end with my land.

You guys work fast, can I hire you?  Just got back from my place east of Kirkland. The water is high isn't it? Highest I've seen since we started going up there. Good luck next week, I expect you'll be up for the opener.  Cheers

Yesterday I couldn't spell carpenter... now I are one!!!  Where's Monique and the kids???... Monique would make a darn good supervisor and the kids should be laborers!!!   ... and what aboot the fish???... I didn't see one damn fish in the reeport!!!... where's the food???... did y'all live off of beer??? (liquid diet?)  You can do much better on the Jiggy Jiggy reports!!!.. I give this one a "C-"!!!   ... always remember!.. Monique holding fish = A+!!!
So what missionary work are you guys planning on doing?
Nice job on the porch, now the pilsener pilferer will be able to drink bug free.
Pee poor planning on your part doesn't qualify as a crisis on anyone elses agenda bubba!
Looks Good! Will be the perfect spot to sit back with a beer at the end of the day
COOL!!!!!!!its true ...even in Star Wars Ewoks made cool houses
Yah.. but where do I sit now.. lol
Good Point! Back to the drawing board T.J.
I agree...
Ahhh... as always theres no locks on the doors....  Ill even leave the good stuff out for ya!
Want to come work with my framing crew? haha  Good job. and awesome report.
Great job TJ.  Love the steeple  Joey
Great job mate.. i enjoyed reading that. I hope your family appreciates all the beer you had to drink to craft that porch:)

Naure's cooler..  Classic!  Let's hope we'll be chillin the suds in the lake next weekend and not in the snow eh?!  Musta got loads of snow this winter..  That lake is high!  You got any beavers in the area?  Ah spring..  cheers HD
ya.   ya better not... lol
Save the trees, eat beaver!!
